aadi nalandiyayange sanwidhanaya idiripath karana “china sarkas 2011” me masa 31 sita ape්ral 30 dakwa sugathadasa gruhastha kridanganayedi pawathwe.loka prakata nanjin akro batik kandayama sahabhagithwayen pawathwanu labana me sarkas sandarshanaya sandaha 40 denekugen yuth kandayamak sahabhagi wana athara miniththu 90 ka sandarshana wara dekak dinapatha pawathwimata katayuthu yoda atha.sama sandarshanayak sandahama narambaannan 4000 kata adhika praweshapath alewi kirimata sanwidhayaka kamituwa balaporoththu wana athara sandarshana kanda kihipayakata warga kara atha.
